text:
[Verse]
Underneath the sunny sky
Where dreams can fly so high
Laughter's in the cool breeze
Time and worries freeze

[Verse 2]
Sand between our toes
Waves that come and go
Kites are soaring higher
Hearts are full of fire

[Chorus]
In these summer daydreams
Life is sweet like ice cream
We’re dancing in the light
Everything feels right

[Verse 3]
Singing with the birds
Not a care not a word
Sunsets paint the blue
With a golden hue

[Bridge]
Hand in hand we roam
This place feels like home
Chasing all that gleams
Wrapped in summer dreams

[Chorus]
In these summer daydreams
Life is sweet like ice cream
We’re dancing in the light
Everything feels right
title: Summer Daydreams
